name: JEFFERSON COUNTY, a Political Subdivision of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, and the County Commissioners Association of Pennsylvania v. The COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF JEFFERSON COUNTY, Pennsylvania, the 54th Judicial District. Appeal of the County Commissioners Association of Pennsylvania; Jefferson County, a Political Subdivision of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, and the County Commissioners Association of Pennsylvania v. The Court of Common Pleas of Jefferson County, Pennsylvania, The 54th Judicial District. Appeal of the Jefferson County Commissioners
name_abbreviation: Jefferson County v. Court of Common Pleas of Jefferson County

parties: JEFFERSON COUNTY, a Political Subdivision of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, and the County Commissioners Association of Pennsylvania v. The COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF JEFFERSON COUNTY, Pennsylvania, the 54th Judicial District. Appeal of the County Commissioners Association of Pennsylvania. Jefferson County, a Political Subdivision of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, and the County Commissioners Association of Pennsylvania v. The Court of Common Pleas of Jefferson County, Pennsylvania, The 54th Judicial District. Appeal of the Jefferson County Commissioners.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 20th day of December, 2000, the order of the Commonwealth Court is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Jeffrey Lundy, Lukehart & Lundy, Punxsutawney, for Jefferson County.
Anthony T. McBeth, Robert L. Knupp, Knupp & Kodak, P.C., Harrisburg, for County Com’rs Ass’n of Pa.
Maryellen Gallagher, Philadelphia, for CCP Jefferson County.

JEFFERSON COUNTY, a Political Subdivision of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, and the County Commissioners Association of Pennsylvania v. The COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF JEFFERSON COUNTY, Pennsylvania, the 54th Judicial District. Appeal of the County Commissioners Association of Pennsylvania. The Court of Common Pleas of Jefferson County, Pennsylvania, The 54th Judicial District. Appeal of the Jefferson County Commissioners.

Dec. 20, 2000.
Jeffrey Lundy, Lukehart & Lundy, Punxsutawney, for Jefferson County.
